subject: [Radiance-general] set PATH and RAYPATH in the batch file -WINDOWS 8.1
body:
Message-ID: <CA+dqh62sK1Ga-PRfFO-gax66dCGt8=O_+tSVfnvsPQxOv=1eNw@mail.gmail.com>

Hi Giuseppe,

you can just drop the Perl exe files from
http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/radwinexe.shtml
into Radiance's bin folder.  They don't require a Perl interpreter to
be installed.

Best

Axel
